00011 #ifndef __gtx_determinant_inl__
00012 #define __gtx_determinant_inl__
00013 
00014 #include "gtx_determinant.h"
00015 
00016 namespace glm
00017 {
00018     template <typename T>
00019     inline T determinantGTX(const _xmat2<T>& m)
00020     {
00021         return m[0][0] * m[1][1] - m[1][0] * m[0][1];
00022     }
00023 
00024     template <typename T>
00025     inline T determinantGTX(const _xmat3<T>& m)
00026     {
00027         return m[0][0] * (m[1][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[1][2])
00028             - m[1][0] * (m[0][1] * m[2][2] - m[2][1] * m[0][2])
00029             + m[2][0] * (m[0][1] * m[1][2] - m[1][1] * m[0][2]);
00030     }
00031 
00032     template <typename T> 
00033     inline T determinantGTX(const _xmat4<T>& m)
00034     {
00035         T SubFactor00 = m[2][2] * m[3][3] - m[3][2] * m[2][3];
00036         T SubFactor01 = m[2][1] * m[3][3] - m[3][1] * m[2][3];
00037         T SubFactor02 = m[2][1] * m[3][2] - m[3][1] * m[2][2];
00038         T SubFactor03 = m[2][0] * m[3][3] - m[3][0] * m[2][3];
00039         T SubFactor04 = m[2][0] * m[3][2] - m[3][0] * m[2][2];
00040         T SubFactor05 = m[2][0] * m[3][1] - m[3][0] * m[2][1];
00041 
00042         glm::_xvec4<T> DetCof(
00043             + (m[1][1] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor01 + m[1][3] * SubFactor02),
00044             - (m[1][0] * SubFactor00 - m[1][2] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor04),
00045             + (m[1][0] * SubFactor01 - m[1][1] * SubFactor03 + m[1][3] * SubFactor05),
00046             - (m[1][0] * SubFactor02 - m[1][1] * SubFactor04 + m[1][2] * SubFactor05));
00047 
00048         return m[0][0] * DetCof[0] 
00049              + m[0][1] * DetCof[1] 
00050              + m[0][2] * DetCof[2] 
00051              + m[0][3] * DetCof[3];
00052     }
00053 }
00054 
00055 #endif//__gtx_determinant_inl__
